title: Segment Detail

attributablePartnerId.title: Attributable Partner ID
attributablePartnerId.description: The segment provider who owns the attributableSegmentId.

attributableSegmentId.title: Attributable Segment ID
attributableSegmentId.description: The single segment accredit for user targeting among all the segments in the placement's targeting rule for the purposes of tracking costs and paying partners.

segments.title: Segments
segments.description: The intersection of the user segments that both: a) the user belonged to, and b) the ad was targeting. NOT the full list of segments that the user belonged to at the time of the auction.
